languages.text: {n}Новые астропаты были опасны для себя и окружающих. Их дикий неукрощенный талант приводил к ужасным манифестациям варпа в реальности, но жертвы эти были невеликой платой за то, что Даргонус продолжал слышать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу} и обращаться к не{mf|му|й}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Новые астропаты были опасны для себя и окружающих. Их дикий неукрощенный талант приводил к ужасным манифестациям варпа в реальности, но жертвы эти были невеликой платой за то, что Даргонус продолжал слышать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу} и обращаться к не{mf|му|й}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The new astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent had led to the horrifying Warp manifestations in reality, but those victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent had led to the horrifying Warp manifestations in reality, but those victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

{n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些新来的星语者十分危险，无论对他们自己还是对其他人而言都同样如此。他们狂野不羁的力量让可怕的亚空间幻景变成了现实。不过，达戈努斯和行商浪人之间恢复了顺畅的通讯，与此相比，那些受害者只能算是微不足道的代价。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些新来的星语者十分危险，无论对他们自己还是对其他人而言都同样如此。他们狂野不羁的力量让可怕的亚空间幻景变成了现实。不过，达戈努斯和行商浪人之间恢复了顺畅的通讯，与此相比，那些受害者只能算是微不足道的代价。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los nuevos Astrópatas eran peligrosos tanto para los demás como para ellos mismos. Su talento salvaje e indomable les llevó a materializar en la realidad horribles manifestaciones de la disformidad, pero las víctimas fueron un pequeño peaje por permitir a Dargonus oír y hablar con su {mf|Maestro|Maestra}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los nuevos Astrópatas eran peligrosos tanto para los demás como para ellos mismos. Su talento salvaje e indomable les llevó a materializar en la realidad horribles manifestaciones de la disformidad, pero las víctimas fueron un pequeño peaje por permitir a Dargonus oír y hablar con su {mf|Maestro|Maestra}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}新しい感応通信官は、外部の者にとっても身内にとっても危険な存在だった。彼らの荒々しい未開の才能により、恐ろしい<歪み>の出現が現実となったが、ダルゴナスがその声を聞き、話すことができたことと比較すれば、犠牲者が出たことはほんの些細な損失でしか過ぎなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新しい感応通信官は、外部の者にとっても身内にとっても危険な存在だった。彼らの荒々しい未開の才能により、恐ろしい<歪み>の出現が現実となったが、ダルゴナスがその声を聞き、話すことができたことと比較すれば、犠牲者が出たことはほんの些細な損失でしか過ぎなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces nouveaux astropathes sont aussi dangereux pour les autres que pour eux-mêmes. Leurs talents incontrôlables et sauvages font apparaître d'abominables manifestations du Warp, mais les victimes en sont un faible prix à payer pour Dargonus qui peut enfin communiquer avec {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces nouveaux astropathes sont aussi dangereux pour les autres que pour eux-mêmes. Leurs talents incontrôlables et sauvages font apparaître d'abominables manifestations du Warp, mais les victimes en sont un faible prix à payer pour Dargonus qui peut enfin communiquer avec {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die neuen Astropathen waren eine Gefahr für sich selbst und andere. Ihr wildes, ungezähmtes Talent führte dazu, dass sich in der Realität grauenhafte Warp-Wesen manifestierten. Die Opfer waren jedoch ein kleiner Preis dafür, dass Dargonus {mf|seinen Herren|seine Herrin} sprechen hören konnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new Astropaths were dangerous both to others and themselves. Their wild, untamed talent led to the materialisation of horrifying Warp manifestations into reality, but the victims were a small toll for allowing Dargonus to hear and speak to its {mf|Master|Mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die neuen Astropathen waren eine Gefahr für sich selbst und andere. Ihr wildes, ungezähmtes Talent führte dazu, dass sich in der Realität grauenhafte Warp-Wesen manifestierten. Die Opfer waren jedoch ein kleiner Preis dafür, dass Dargonus {mf|seinen Herren|seine Herrin} sprechen hören konnte.{/n}
